English Translation: be quiet/shut up, be quiet all
you s. look at the giraffe
you pl. look at  the giraffes

Yonah Ndege (2018, female speaker): ngageth, ayimo ngagesh “two elephants” or possibly “one two”

Daudi Peterson (2018): seesa kenapeta s.&pl. (“I see the cattle”)

Daudi (2012): oringojinia (this is a Maa word but they say it is theirs and the Maasai borrowed it)
